page.title: 02OUR SCHOOL
page.content: There are 120 children,5 teachers a headteacher and 7 dinner ladies in school.It is a{small junior and infant school.We leave when we are 11 to go to a comprehensive school.Our school is surrounded by countryside.We cover many{subjects,}art, maths, topic, language,P.E.and music.We come to school on a Trent bus and arrive at 8.30am.Leasons begin at 9.00 and finish at 3.30pm.We have an area of grass and a small playground to play on at playtimes.We have lunch in the school hall at 12.00.My favourite dinner is curry,rice and peas followed by jam roly poly.Then we go onto the {Pingle}to play. The{Pingle}is our field.I like the school because it is built in a lovely area with wildlife and countryside all around.
